projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A full-stack application that allows users to create, manage, and track their tasks. It features an intuitive dashboard, user authentication, and real-time notifications.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A complete online store with a shopping cart, checkout, online payment, product management, and an admin panel. Integrated with major payment gateways.

projects.title: Blog with CMS
projects.description: A personal blog with a content management system (CMS) to create, edit, and delete posts. Optimized for SEO and with a responsive design.

projects.title: Data Analysis API
projects.description: A RESTful API for analyzing large volumes of data. The architecture is based on microservices and uses high-performance technologies for data processing and querying.
